steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5uth2","text":"To purify Lambda protein phosphatase (λ PPase), fuse the protein phosphatase to a N-terminal 6xHis-tag through cloning into a pET-DUET1 vector (available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r6fm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dnoul","text":"After the transformation of the pET-DUET1 vector encoding 6xHis-TEV-λ PPase in E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells (Novagen Cat# 70956-4), grow cells in 2x Tryptone Yeast extract (TY)medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continue at  .
